channel.title: BitBay Marketplace
channel.description:
Hello,
How can I actually get to the bitbay marketplace to see items for sale? I have already downloaded the client/wallet/app think, and all it allowed me to do was to post something I wanted to buy or sell. I saw there was a marketplace in the youtube video that looked very much like ebay or amazon but does it really exist? Why not just make it availalble to a web browser? Am I missing something?
Please advise, Thenewb

item.title: BitBay Marketplace
item.dc:creator: @tradersnow
item.description:
@tradersnow wrote:

Hey thanks reaching out!

BitBay does have a web marketplace in beta right now, which is due to be completed after the upcoming Dynamic Peg Release. You can use it today to buy/sell goods, just know that there might be a few bugs that havenâ€™t been worked out yet.

Here is the link to it:
https://beta.bitbay.market/market

Read full topic

item.title: BitBay Marketplace

item.description:
@thenewb wrote:
